column4: could you redirect your complains to the proper mailing list ?
i'm just discussing it, and if you don't like that, just /ignore
no really, this is a support related channel, and you are not supporting neither asking for support, so you are disturbing the channel, the same way the maintainter disturbed you with the upgrade
